location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:96 x 70 mmCondition:The image is in good condition.Foliation:'b'; '26'Process:Silver gelatin print

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View in Linga (Lingeh) of a group of women standing and sitting in the archway of what may be a yakhchāl (ice pit) or birkeh (cistern). One woman stands while pouring from a bucket or kettle. Two other women sit before her; one of whom appears to be carrying an upturned bowl on her head.Inscriptions:Lower left, below image, in pen: ‘Linga.’Upper left, above image, in pencil, crossed-out: ‘b’Lower right, alongside image, in pencil: ‘26’Lower right, below image, in pen: ‘(Jan. 1918)’
